SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, s.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, b.title, b.content, b.cnt,
IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_id = s.students_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( students_id, title, content, create_at ) VALUES ( #{studentsId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_at = NOW() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT title, content, update_at AS updateAt, create_at AS createAt, cnt FROM board WHERE board_id=#{boardId}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, s.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, b.title, b.content, b.cnt, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_id = s.students_id WHERE s.students_name Like CONCAT('%',#{studentsName},'%')
